tip: Close your eyes and take 5 slow, deep breaths. Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 6.Do a quick tension scan: relax your shoulders, drop your jaw, and let your tongue rest at the bottom of your mouth to release built-up stress.

Stand up, roll your shoulders 10 times forward and 10 times backward. Refresh yourself with cold water: splash water on your face, take 3 deep breaths, and expose yourself to bright light for 1–2 minutes.

Name 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, 1 you can taste. Name the narrative: say 'I'm noticing I'm having the thought that…' to create distance from anxious thoughts.
